name: unfold-ID
description:
A game of unfolding personalities.  You and the other characters are stranded on a deserted island in the middle of the ocean. The crash landing has left you with mild amnesia, and you are slowly unfolding bits and pieces of who you are. You have three goals:

1. Find out who you are. 

2. Get someone to say your name.

3. Find a way to live on or leave the island together.

The only things you need to play are players, pencils, and paper.

This game was created live on Twitch (with some editing later on) on 7/21 by Alexander Sprague and Jessica Geyer of Wannabe Games. We are working on flexing our creative muscles and making new fun things for people. Follow us on twitter @jawska and @kittycrusade and drop us a suggestion for a game idea. We make something new every Sunday!
